definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: In cricket, a no ball reckons as one run.
sentences.chinese: 在板球中，投球违例要失一分。

sentences.english: We ride to school on a bicycle and playing cricket isno problem, " Shivanath said, according to the Daily Mail."
sentences.chinese: 我们可以骑自行车去学校，打板球也不成问题”。

sentences.english: To force the cancellation or postponement of(an outdoor event) because of rain.
sentences.chinese: 板球比赛因天雨而取消。

sentences.english: At the same time, maybe coincidentally, Pakistan's cricketing powers have been in decline.
sentences.chinese: 同时，巴基斯坦板球实力一直处于下滑中。

sentences.english: Though it went on year round, the height of cricket fighting was between the summer solstice and autumn equinox.
sentences.chinese: 虽然它了全年的高度板球战斗之间的夏至和秋分。

sentences.english: I can rebound and I can score occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 我偶尔能够抢到篮板球或投篮得分。

sentences.english: I think Josh is probably a better perimeter shooter and rebounder than Ronny.
sentences.chinese: 我认为约什在投篮和抢篮板球能力上比罗尼更好些。

sentences.english: The cricket match was washed out by rain.
sentences.chinese: 板球比赛因天雨而取消。

sentences.english: The Indian cricket board, the BCCI, named an interim IPL chairman after crisis talks on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 印度板球协会BCCI已经任命了一名临时主席。

sentences.english: Cricket cannot rival football in excitement.
sentences.chinese: 板球远不如足球够刺激。

sentences.english: In a game of cricket, what is the minimum number of referee(s) needed?
sentences.chinese: 在板球运动比赛中，最少需要多少名球证？

sentences.english: The player at bat in baseball and cricket.
sentences.chinese: 在棒球或板球比赛中担任外野员。

sentences.english: He is still a cricketing hero even now.
The cricket games will be held in the stadium of Guangdong University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 板球比赛场位于广东工业大学校园内。

sentences.english: Some of this new funding will seek avenues other than cricket.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些新赞助的对象将是板球以外的项目。

sentences.english: This season he has become cricket-mad and he rejoined his swimming club.
sentences.chinese: 这个季节他迷上了板球，并重新加入了游泳俱乐部。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
